department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Integrated Pest Management to Department National Defence Garrison Petawawa on an ‘as and when requested’ basis.
description: This request is for the provision of integrated pest management services to the Department National Defence Garrison Petawawa. The services may be 'as and when' requested by the client. The two streams of this proposal are to be evaluated separately. One stream is for the Ontario region and the other is for the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business Ontario Region. Each stream will have the lowest priced offer issued a Standing Offer.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Bid: W0107-245308 Pest Control Services Petawawa

### Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of DND, intends to award a standing offer contract for Integrated Pest Management (IPM) services to various Service Providers.

#### Contract Details:
* Contract Title: Pest Control Services Petawawa
* Contract Period: From December 1, 2023 to November 30, 2026
* Contract Location: Petawawa, Ontario, Canada

#### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:
Offerors must be prepared to provide a comprehensive IPM plan that includes pest identification, control, prevention, and mitigation measures for DND's Garrison Petawawa. The evaluation criteria are based on the lowest price proposal for each stream: Stream 1 (Ontario Region) and Stream 2 (Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business Ontario Region).

#### Tender Process:
All interested Service Providers must express their interest and obtain the RSO Document through the Canadian Government's procurement website at [www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). The deadline for submitting the RSO bids is November 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Contact Information:
For further information, please contact:
David Barltrop, Southern Ontario Procurement Group
Phone: (not available)
Email: [david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements:
This procurement is covered under various trade agreements, including, but not limited to:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* ...

#### Support Documents:
Tenders must be submitted electronically via Ariba Discovery, along with all required supporting documents.

Note: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Canada Buys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-11-20 by 2:00 PM EST.
